summary: Mendy is a young man struggling to keep his mind focused on rabbinical school. His teacher tells him to rid himself of desires by visiting a prostitute in Tel Aviv. Mendy falls head over heels in love with a Russian harlot named Sasha.
cast: Oren Rehany|Tchelet Semel|Saul Stein|Albert Iluz|Aryeh Moskona|Alon Dahan|Mosko Alkalai|Liat Bein|Yehoyachin Friedlander|Lanny Shahaf|Lupo Berkowitch|Aryeh Hasfari|Harel Noff|Icho Avital|Louise Asher|Jenny Fleicher|Gregory Tal|Igor Mirkurbanov|Julia Gilinski|Chovav Bar-Zilay|Josh Becker|Rav Shmuel|Jonathan Becker|David Ruderman|Yechezkel Mehi|Tzlil Hamayan
title: The Holy Land
